definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: The downside is that you’ll lose at least a few additional inches of ceiling height.
sentences.chinese: 缺點是你可能會額外的失去幾英寸的頭頂空間淨高。

sentences.english: He involuntarily raised his hand to scratch his head.
sentences.chinese: 他下意識地舉起手來搔他的頭頂。

sentences.english: I remember Thierry Henry flicking a ball over his head and scoring.
sentences.chinese: 我記得亨利輕挑一個球越過他頭頂，然後破門。

sentences.english: But Hendrawan is excellent at playing overhead stokes and underarm strokes.
sentences.chinese: 葉誠萬的頭頂擊球和臂下擊球都是絕好的。

sentences.english: Women carry bundles of firewood on their heads in the Sudanese desert.
sentences.chinese: 蘇丹沙漠中，婦女們頭頂着捆好的柴薪。

sentences.english: His head was kind of pinched on top like a deer's, and he had beady eyes like a rat.
sentences.chinese: 他的頭頂很尖，像鹿一樣還有像鼠一樣的豆子眼。

sentences.english: The threat of nuclear war is already hanging over us.
sentences.chinese: 核戰爭的威脅已經籠罩在我們的頭頂上。

sentences.english: Lift arms out to side up to shoulder level and then to ears and lower.
sentences.chinese: 首先伸直兩臂與肩部平行，然後舉起到頭頂再放下。

sentences.english: Heroes have a sense of light about them, I think, or should.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得英雄的頭頂一定或者應該有着光環。

sentences.english: In fact I was afraid of those jagged monstrosities all around and over our heads.
sentences.chinese: 事實上我害怕我們頭頂四周那些鋸齒狀的巨獸。
一架飛機在頭頂嗡嗡響。

sentences.english: Bonny bird; wheeling over our heads in the middle of the moor.
sentences.chinese: 漂亮的鳥兒，在荒野地裏，在我們頭頂上回翔。

sentences.english: Place your hand on top of your head, smile, now start humming.
sentences.chinese: 把手放置於你的頭頂，微笑着，開始哼歌。

sentences.english: Yellow stripes on head and light spot on each marginal scute .
sentences.chinese: 頭部兩邊有黃色條紋且頭頂有亮點。

sentences.english: Stretch your arms over your head.
The real nose however is the blowhole on top of the head.
sentences.chinese: 而真正的鼻孔其實是它們頭頂的噴水孔。

definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
one head/a head full of sth/one end (of a stick)/one side/headlong/directly/rapidly/simultaneously
to heave/to lift/to raise up/to uphold
to bow the head/to yield/to give in
